summary: Simple mod that adds linked chests to all vanilla player homes. Put your stuff in a chest at one place, access it from all others. HAYO!
descriptionHtml:
Description
-----------
Simple mod for lazy people that adds linked chests to all vanilla player homes. Put your stuff in a chest at one place, access it from all others. HAYO!

Look for chests tagged \"Enchanted Chest.\" Available in all vanilla player homes right after purchase.

Looking for a German translation? [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9285]Here\'s[/url] one by TecDemonic.


Installation
------------
Just drop the contents from the archive in your Skyrim\\Data folder.


License
-------
Do whatever you want with it, but give me credit and don\'t make any money off it.
author: Argo
